thread.title: OFFICIAL: Hull City bring in N'Diaye
thread.title_full: OFFICIAL: Hull City bring in N'Diaye

title: OFFICIAL: Hull City bring in N'Diaye
text:
0 31 Jan 2017 22:24:41 The former Sunderland midfielder returns to the Premier League after having made just seven Liga appearances this season 
Alfred N'Diaye has returned to the Premier League, swapping Villarreal for Hull City on deadline day. 
Keep up to date with all the Deadline Day rumours! 
N'Diaye last played for Sunderland in 2013-14 but the midfielder is back in England after arriving from La Liga on a loan deal until the end of the season. 
The 26-year-old, who will wear the number 10 shirt, only joined Villarreal from fellow Spanish outfit Real Betis in July last year. 
Senegal international N'Diaye made seven Liga appearances for Villarreal, with six of those coming from the bench this term. 
N'Diaye joins Hull with the club bottom of the Premier League heading into Wednesday's showdown at Manchester United. Related
